52#define IOS_MODE_CNTLR_WRITE 1
53#define IOS_MODE_CNTLR_READ 2
54
55#define AM_HAL_IOS_INT_ERR (AM_HAL_IOS_INT_FOVFL | AM_HAL_IOS_INT_FUNDFL | AM_HAL_IOS_INT_FRDERR)
56#define AM_HAL_IOS_XCMP_INT (AM_HAL_IOS_INT_XCMPWR | AM_HAL_IOS_INT_XCMPWF | AM_HAL_IOS_INT_XCMPRR | AM_HAL_IOS_INT_XCMPRF)
57
58#define SENSOR0_DATA_SIZE 896
59
60#define SENSOR0_FREQ 120 // 12 times a second
61
62#define IOM_IOS_CHECKSUM 1
63
64#define IOS_WRAP_START_ADDRESS 0x00
65
66#define IOS_DBG_MSG 0
67
68#define IOS_REGACC_THRESHOLD_01 AM_HAL_IOS_ACCESS_INT_08 // 0x8 at wrap mode
69#define IOS_REGACC_THRESHOLD_02 AM_HAL_IOS_ACCESS_INT_1F // 0x1F at wrap mode
70#define IOS_WRAP_HALF_ADDRESS 0x20
71
72//
73// Apollo5 LRAM is defined as device memory which should be access aligned
74// so we re-define here to replace that in lib
75//
76void ios_memcpy(void* dst, const void* src, size_t size);
77inline void ios_memcpy(void* dst, const void* src, size_t size)
78{
79 for ( uint16_t cpy_index = 0; cpy_index < (size); cpy_index++ )
80 {
81 *((uint8_t*)dst + cpy_index) = *((uint8_t*)src + cpy_index);
82 }
83}
84
85void ios_memset(void * dst, uint8_t val, size_t size);
86inline void ios_memset(void * dst, uint8_t val, size_t size)
87{
88 for ( uint16_t cpy_index = 0; cpy_index < (size); cpy_index++ )
89 {
90 *((uint8_t*)dst + cpy_index) = val;
91 }
92}
